**sandbox/dk/04: imagep() with colormap**

Salinity for the drifter dataset
```{r 04,fig.cap="**Salinity section based on a drifter**"}
library(oce)
data(drifter)
cm <- colormap(zlim=c(33.5, 36), col=oceColorsJet)
p <- drifter[["pressure"]][,1] # note that p is a matrix
t <- drifter[["time"]]
S <- t(drifter[["salinity"]]) # note the transpose
hist(S, xlim=c(33.5, 36), breaks=200) # the xlim from playing around â€” good for workshop
imagep(t, p, S, colormap=cm, ylim=rev(range(p)))
contour(t, p, S, level=35, add=TRUE, drawlabels=FALSE) # check a colour
```
